actions.description:
The shadar-kai makes three Spiked Chain attacks.

It can use Shadow Jump after one of these attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or suffer one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d6):

- 1–2: Decay: The target takes 22 (4d10) necrotic damage.
- 3–4: Grapple: The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the shadar-kai can't grapple another target.
- 5–6: Topple: The target is knocked prone.
actions.name: Spiked Chain

specialTraits.description: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry
